required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Eating and Physical Activity Patterns of the Population Working in the Uruguayan State Electrical Company.
clinical_study.official_title: Eating and Physical Activity Patterns of the Population Working in the Uruguayan State Electrical Company.

lead_sponsor.agency: Administración Nacional de Usinas y Transmisiones Eléctricas

collaborator.agency: Comisión Nacional de Investigación Científica y Tecnológica

clinical_study.source: Administración Nacional de Usinas y Transmisiones Eléctricas

brief_summary.textblock: Stuydy of eatin and physical activity patterns in Uruguayan workers and association with obesity, overweight, and tasks.

detailed_description.textblock: A sample of workers from the electrical company will be studies as to eating and physical activity patterns, weight variations, and assigned tasks.

primary_outcome.description: weight in kilograms will be taken records and in person from 2010
Height in meters will be taken records and in person from 2010
body mass index in weight / meters squared

secondary_outcome.description: Diet in investigated with 24 hours recall

secondary_outcome.measure: Diet by frequency of food consumption

other_outcome.description: Physical activity will be measured with International Physical Activity Questionnaires (IPAQ)
The accelerometer is shown as one of the most accurate techniques in recording and saving the amount and level of physical activity, by each person in a given period of time.
sedentary or active type of work

study_pop.textblock: It will include all the officials who joined the company from January 1, 2010 to December 31, 2017. They are 1964 aged between 18 and 65 years old.They are living in Montevideo and 416 are women and 1,548 are men.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- It will include all the officials who joined the company from January 1, 2010 to December 31, 2017, of whom they are between 18 and 65 years old, and the total was from 1964.
Exclusion Criteria:
- On the other hand, regarding the officials who meet the inclusion criteria, the following exclusion criteria are established. Therefore, those officials who:
- Do not have a medical check-up at admission and at least one checkup between one year and two years after entering the company
- Officials who no longer continue to work at the institution at the date of the study.
- Participants who do not have weight and height recorded in the medical record

overall_official.affiliation: Servicio Medico UTE - Sta Fe 1041, 11800 Montevideo, Uruguay

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Administración Nacional de Usinas y Transmisiones Eléctricas
responsible_party.investigator_title: EATING AND PHYSICAL ACTIVITY PATTERNS OF THE POPULATION WORKING IN THE URUGUAYAN STATE ELECTRICAL COMPANY.
